O Suite Device é uma plataforma modular: The Device Suite is a modular configuration platform for Dualbase products.
Conversor USB/SDI12 é um equipamento cap: The USB/SDI12 converter is a device capable of communicating with SDI-12 devices in order to check their operation and access configurations.
Capacidade de enviar quaisquer comandos: Ability to send any typed commands (transparent mode), as well as having some shortcuts for predefined commands.
Identifica o endereço do sensor automati: Automatically identifies the sensor address (for this case, it only allows 1 sensor on the bus).
Compatível com plataforma Windows (XP ou: Compatible with Windows platform (XP or higher, including Windows 11).
Compatível com todas as versões do SDI-1: Compatible with all versions of SDI-12 (including v1.4).
Evite prejuízos em redes de monitorament: Avoid losses in hydrological monitoring networks. Meet the LimniDB-Borbulha bubbling level sensor, which does not come into contact with water, reducing operating and maintenance costs.
Faixa de medição: 0 a 20 mca (metro de c: Measurement range: 0 to 20 mca (meter of water column).
Unidades de indicação: cca (centímetro d: Indication units: cca (centimeter of water column), mca, foot (ft), mBar and PSI
Solicitando dados de medição ao disposit: Requesting measurement data from the device!
Sincronizado com o sensor concluida!\nAt:
Synchronized with the sensor completed!
Update in progress, please wait...
Aguardando sincronizar com o sensor... \: Waiting to synchronize with the sensor...
O LimniDB-CAP faz a medição de pressão a: The LimniDB-CAP measures pressure through the ceramic capacitive element, making it very robust without losing metrological qualities.
Elemento do sensor capacitivo cerâmico c: Ceramic capacitive sensor element with temperature compensation.
Cabo em poliuretano com filtro contra ra: Polyurethane cable with UV radiation filter with Kevlar (optional).
Tipo de medição disponível: absoluto ou: Available measurement type: absolute or differential
Dispositivo que permite a entrada manual: Device that allows manual data entry and communication with a datalogger using the SDI-12 serial communication protocol.
Possuir membrana de 16 teclas produzido: Having a 16-key membrane produced based on the recommendations of NBR 13173 of August 2012.
Display LCD alfanumérico com 02 linhas d: Alphanumeric LCD display with 02 lines of 12 digits each line and 16 segments.
Configurável a partir de aplicativo exte: Configurable from an external application compatible with Windows 10 operating system.
Enviando configurações iniciais para o d: Sending initial configurations to the device!
